languages.text: {n}Подняв глаза, вы замечаете, что все уже разочаровано сбросили плитки на стол, кроме вас и Джай.{/n} "Вот мы и остались вдвоем, шерин. Я вскрываюсь".
{n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."
languages.original_text: {n}Подняв глаза, вы замечаете, что все уже разочаровано сбросили плитки на стол, кроме вас и Джай.{/n} "Вот мы и остались вдвоем, шерин. Я вскрываюсь".

traits.locale_text: {n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."
{n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."
{n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."
{n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."

languages.text: {n}当你抬起头时，你发现除了婕伊之外，其他人都已经失望地把牌扔在了桌子上。{/n}“只剩下咱们两个了，亲爱的。我要开牌了。”
languages.original_text: {n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你抬起头时，你发现除了婕伊之外，其他人都已经失望地把牌扔在了桌子上。{/n}“只剩下咱们两个了，亲爱的。我要开牌了。”

languages.text: {n}顔を上げると、ジェイ以外の全員がすでにタイルをテーブルの上に投げ捨て、落胆している。{/n} 「残るは私たち二人だけだよ、シャリーン。じゃあ、あたしの手を見せるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}顔を上げると、ジェイ以外の全員がすでにタイルをテーブルの上に投げ捨て、落胆している。{/n} 「残るは私たち二人だけだよ、シャリーン。じゃあ、あたしの手を見せるよ」

languages.text: {n}Cuando levantas la mirada, ves que aparte de Jae todo el mundo ha tirado sus fichas sobre la mesa, decepcionado.{/n} «Solo quedamos l{mf|o|a}s dos, shreen. Yo voy a mostrar mi mano».
languages.original_text: {n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando levantas la mirada, ves que aparte de Jae todo el mundo ha tirado sus fichas sobre la mesa, decepcionado.{/n} «Solo quedamos l{mf|o|a}s dos, shreen. Yo voy a mostrar mi mano».

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous levez les yeux, vous remarquez que tout le monde a déjà jeté ses tuiles sur la table, l'air dépité, sauf Jae.{/n} « Ça va se jouer entre nous deux, shereen. Je vais poser ma main. »
languages.original_text: {n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous levez les yeux, vous remarquez que tout le monde a déjà jeté ses tuiles sur la table, l'air dépité, sauf Jae.{/n} « Ça va se jouer entre nous deux, shereen. Je vais poser ma main. »

languages.text: {n}Als du nach oben schaust, erkennst du, dass alle außer Jae ihre Spielsteine bereits enttäuscht auf den Tisch geworfen haben.{/n} "Nur wir zwei sind übrig, Shereen. Ich werde meine Hand offenlegen."
languages.original_text: {n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du nach oben schaust, erkennst du, dass alle außer Jae ihre Spielsteine bereits enttäuscht auf den Tisch geworfen haben.{/n} "Nur wir zwei sind übrig, Shereen. Ich werde meine Hand offenlegen."

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kaldırdığında Jae hariç herkesin karolarını hayal kırıklığıyla masaya attığını görüyorsun.{/n} "Sadece ikimiz kaldık şirinim. Elimi açıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}When you look up, you see that everyone else apart from Jae has already tossed their tiles onto the table in disappointment.{/n} "It's just us two left, shereen. I'm going to show my hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini kaldırdığında Jae hariç herkesin karolarını hayal kırıklığıyla masaya attığını görüyorsun.{/n} "Sadece ikimiz kaldık şirinim. Elimi açıyorum."
